attributes.action: Act immediately to secure the release of the 2 kidnapped British subjects currently held in Nigeria's Delta region.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are 2 British subjects currently held captive in the Niger Delta, in Nigeria. They have now been held captive for 79 days now (Today 26-11-08)

The major reason for their continued detention is the Prime Minister, Gordon Brown's pledge to assist the Federal Government of Nigerias' military with assistance & training. This has angered the militants who are holding these 2 men. The British Government has remained extremely quiet about the plight of these two captives.

All efforts must be made at the highest level to secure the release of these British subjects.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Foreign and Commonwealth Office www.fco.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
